text: (itaik kannurra pinnarum) musavai avar inattavaril cilartan nampikkai kontanar. Avarkalum tankalai hpir'avnum, avanutaiya inattavarkalum tunpuruttuvarkalo enru payantu konte iruntanar. Enenral, niccayamaka hpir'avn anta pumiyil mikac cakti vayntavanaka iruntan. Niccayamaka avan varampu miri(k kotumai ceypavar)kalil iruntan
